object-type.name: QSettings

value-type.name: QPoint
value-type.inject-code: public final QPoint multiply(float d) { operator_multiply_assign(d); return this; } public final QPoint multiply(int d) { operator_multiply_assign(d); return this; }

value-type.name: QLocale

object-type.name: QAbstractItemModel

value-type.name: QByteArray

replace.to: int pos, int len, QByteArray after

modify-argument.conversion-rule: QByteArray b1 = qtjambi_to_qstring(__jni_env, (jstring) %in).toUtf8(); const char* %out = b1.data();
QByteArray b2 = qtjambi_to_qstring(__jni_env, (jstring) %in).toUtf8(); const char* %out = b2.data();
QByteArray b3 = qtjambi_to_qstring(__jni_env, (jstring) %in).toUtf8(); const char* %out = b3.data();

object-type.name: QDataStream
QTextStream
QFutureWatcherBase

modify-function.inject-code: __rcDevice = null; // clear() call removes device from stream

object-type.name: QSignalTransition
QState
